Key Match Events: Jay Huff connected on three consecutive 3-pointers, then capped the run off with an offensive rebound leading to a reverse dunk, taking the Grizzlies' advantage to 85-71
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ja Morant scored 20 points before leaving in the third quarter with a right hamstring injury
Others: Rui Hachimura was out with an illness, giving rookie Dalton Knect from Tennessee his first NBA start. Memphis held a 72-68 lead in the third quarter when reserve Jay Huff's 3-point shooting helped them extend their lead to 85-71. The Lakers played without starting center Anthony Davis, who was suffering from left heel soreness. Grizzlies coach Taylor Jenkins missed the game because of a death in the family. Assistant coach Tuomas Iisalo led the team.
